transcript:
Customer: 6 baje tak kya?

Customer: [inaudible]

Customer: [inaudible]

Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Achcha ha ji.
Customer: Ha ji pappu sir hemant baat kar raha hu sir 4 baje phone kiya tha aapne receive nahi kiya sir.
Customer: Sir mere ko call hi nahi lagaya abhi.
Executive: Nahi sir maine call kiya tha agar mai baat karu to 3:30 baje maine phone kiya aapko sir.
Customer: Nahi mere paas koi call nahi hai ab.
Executive: Achcha aisa nahi sir us time shayad maine to call kiya tha matlab ring not reachual something kar neta to office ke shetra ke bahar honge aap abhi sir time hai pappu sir mai video meeting ka link bhej du aapko.
Customer: Abhi to nahi ho payega.
Executive: Abhi nahi ho payega dekho sir mai aapko mujhe dikkat batao kahan pe aayi ki abhi tak ek bhi maturity nahi aaya issue yahi dikkat hai ya fir aur bhi koi issue hai sir.
Customer: Nahi ek cheez to yahi hai ki ek bhi jo bhi lead aa rahi hai wo fake aa rahi hai aur matlab ek bhi convergesation nahi ho raha.
Executive: Sir ek bhi deal nahi hua matlab in aap ye keh rahe ho ki 6 mahine hone wale hai sir abhi aapko ek bhi deal india mart ki taraf se nahi mili.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Single deal milna sir to mushkil hai aap ye jo keh rahe hain kyuki sir hamara jo basic service sir basic basic service ka jo average hota hai ki har do teen mahine pe at least achi deal mil jati hai aapne sir RV by lead consume kiya hai ye by lead the radhe naam ka ye the junagadh junagadh se the pitambari powder chahiye tha ispe kya baat hui sir.
Customer: Ha ispe baat hui to ye bol raha hai ki hai na hum to do saal se jisse le rahe hain usse le liya humne to maal.
Executive: Achcha do saal se le rahe hain matlab ye buyer sahi tha matlab connect hone me delay ho gaya fir ye already matlab dusre se le liya aur ek aur tha sir delhi ka buyer tha amit naam ka inse baat hui.
Customer: Amit naam ka aaj ya kal ha aaj hi sir aaj hi agar mai dekhu ye 16 tarikh kal ka hai sir.
Customer: Ha kal ka hai.
Customer: Hmm kal wale se to wo to mana hi kar raha hai na.
Executive: Kyu sir.
Customer: Usko chahiye nahi.
Executive: Mai aap se kal baat karu dekho sir.
Customer: Kal kitne baje phone karu sir aapko aap ne kal 9 baje kar lena mere ko.
Executive: Theek hai 9 baje kar leta hu but sir ye aapne na hamare dekho sir aapko kya hai humne aapka number apna number diya tha sir ki koi bhi dikkat hai aapko yaad hoga sir aapka jab wo issue hua tha aloe vera wala jo fund fasa hua tha yaad hoga sir aapko.
Customer: Ha ha ha ha ha to humne resolve karaya tha sir wo maine mere sir aur maine resolve kara tha aapka paisa refund kara tha right sir.
Executive: Achcha achcha ha ha ha ha ha to koi bhi dikkat ho mai apna apne number dobara whatsapp pe dal deta hu aap mujhe direct waha connect kar lo sir theek hai kyuki dekho sir aap hamare customer ke number pe phone karte ho mana nahi kar rahe but aap waha pe phone karoge wo concern hamare hi paas aata hai sir isko koi ye problem aa rahi hai se baat karke resolve karo ki kaun manager aapke hai agar mai baat karu to aapke account manager ka naam mai bata deta hu sir aapke account manager rahul hai aur mai unka senior baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Wo wo bhai sahab to aise bol rahe hain ki is plan me to aapke aayega hi nahi convergesation hi nahi hoga.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir dekho baat plan ka nahi hota sir aisa nahi ki wo unhone aisa bola hoga shayad wo samjhane ka tarika alag hoga sir aisa nahi ki is plan me benefit nahi hai sir but thoda sa na ye hota hai ki aap socho aapki listing pe depend hota hai ki aap dikh kahan rahe ho sir kyuki pappu sir socho na agar koi buyer ko multani mitti kharidni hai delhi se agar wo delhi me hi usko 10 seller ke naam pe hi dikh jaye to aapko kyu phone karega sir ye baat hai wo unhone shayad samjha nahi paye honge mai aapko samjha dunga kyu aisa dikkat aa rahi hai aur aisa nahi ki isme business nahi hai sir hum abhi aapko koi service dene ki baat nahi kar rahe ya fir aap ye lo wo lo aap kyu kar rahe sir aapko business milega tabhi to sir dusra package me jaoge right abhi isse koi benefit nahi aa raha to dusra kahan se loge right sir.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To aap uske liye pareshan na ho aap direct abhi hum aapko mai connect kar lunga ek baar discuss bhi kar lenge theek hai baki sir abhi ye mai aapka ticket close karunga jo aapne concern raise kiya tha to wo mere liye feedback jayega sir aapko theek hai baki sir ki abhi kal jo bhi hoga baki hum aaram se sari che discuss kar lenge abhi ye mai ticket close kar raha hu sir isme koi dikkat sir.
Customer: Kar do koi dikkat nahi.
Executive: Theek hai na ye ticket close karunga to jaise aapko pata hoga feedback jata hai ki ha bhai aap se satisfy ho ki nahi to please se satisfy pe click kar dijiyega koi dikkat to nahi hai sir matlab aap pehle mujhe bata do koi dikkat hai to abhi nahi nahi koi dikkat nahi hai sir theek hai baki mai apne number se aapko fire dal deta hu please jab bhi time mile sir please mujhe direct phone kar lena ki hemant ji discuss karna hai kya dikkat hai isko kaise resolve karna hai to baat karte hain theek hai sir.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai sir abhi mai dal de raha hu please aur sir ye calls vagaira me bhi koi dikkat aa rahi hai kya sir jo direct calls aapko aati hai samne se agar mai dekhu har mahine kuch achi calls aapko aa rahi hai sir aap buyer se baat bhi kar rahe ho.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Mai to calls se kya issue dikkat aa rahi hai sir jo samne se phone aa raha hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi calls aa rahi hai usme bhi to convergesation ho nahi raha mai.
Executive: Achcha usme convergesation nahi ho raha.
Executive: Theek hai pappu sir koi baat nahi ek baar kal mai kitne baje call karu sir aapko 11 12 baje aap kitne baje bataya aapne.
Customer: Ha aap 9 baje baat kar lena kal 9 baje ke baad theek hai sir 9 baje to 9:30 baje se hum log start karte hain to 9:30 baje ke baad mai kabhi bhi kar leta hu sir theek hai 12 baje se pehle.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Yaar thanks feedback dega sir please apna feedback jarur share kare sir aap kar dena sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- No deals closed in the last six months.

- Incoming buyleads are mostly fake.

- No conversion happening from the leads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the average deal closure time.

- Executive discussed past buyleads and their outcomes.

- Executive offered to connect and discuss the issues.

- Executive offered his direct contact number for assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will close the ticket.

- Customer will provide feedback on the ticket.

- Executive will call the customer next day at 9:30 AM.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, customer support
